title: Personal laundry center on every floor, Walk-in closets, WiFi Lounge
posting_body: ['This re-invented collection of spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes in Las Vegas were thoughtfully crafted with every possible lifestyle in mind.', 'You’ll appreciate the designer kitchen fixtures & counter tops, upgraded cabinets and the latest and greatest in stainless steel appliances.', 'Stroll along the rich wood plank flooring and explore your spacious walk-in closets and ultra-modern bathrooms.', 'Exhale as you step out onto your 12-foot balcony and take in the view of the buzzing Las Vegas Strip and watch the sun setting behind the mountains.', 'Schedule a tour today.', '-Walking distance to shopping, school & hospitals', '-Personal laundry center on every floor', '-Elevator accessible to each floor', '-WiFi Lounge', '-Individual climate control', '-Modern white cabinetry with modern brushed nickel hardware', '-Pantry closets', '-Resort-style 9 foot deep pool and recreation deck', '-Short Term Lease', '-Covered Parking', '-Durable granite counter tops', '-Limited access gated community', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
